item.title: Issues while renewing Passport - the JS one
item.description: No, am not talking about my actual passport, which also needs to be renewed soon by the way. Am talking about PassportJS.

item.title: JWT: JSON Web Token - Passing on the secret without letting the neighours know
item.description: Login is still a tough problem! It’s been 5 years since I left coding professionally and still parts of this remain unresolved.
